The RingCX for HubSpot app provides seamless integration between HubSpot and your RingCX contact center.

It offers the following features:

Omnichannel customer engagement
    ●   Handle inbound voice calls, live chat interactions, and more directly from your account within HubSpot
    ●   Give your agents a complete view of the customer journey so they can serve customers better

Tight integration with your HubSpot CRM data
    ●   Quickly identify customers for personalized experiences
    ●   Easily create new tickets or update existing ones for faster after-contact work

Easy to deploy and use
    ●   Prebuilt integration to deploy in hours, not weeks
    ●   Use you browser on any platform (Windows®, Mac®), no software installation is needed
